Did the SAS toggling change in .90? Normally I need to press T and SAS would toggle but now I need to hold T, pause and unpause so SAS would toggle. Sometimes even that does not work. Im confused.

Edited March 3, 2015 by Shurikeeen

Once SAS has been activated are there any red icons visible left from your nav ball?

Yes: Click one of the icons to activate.

No: Get a (higher skilled) pilot into your pod and/or use a more advanced probe core.
Indeed, when I activate SAS there are all the directions I can have it lock to. But my problem is I need to hold down T so I can use SAS.

Never seen or heard of this, so probably need some screenshots to diagnose. Does pressing 'F' key do anything interesting? It sounds to me like your "T" key (toggle switch) is doing what the "F" key (momentary push switch) is supposed to do.

*Facedesk*

I looked in input menu in setting and apparently T-key is both for toggling and holding SAS. No idea why that is there.
